name: Airbnb Listings
description: Dataset of Airbnb property listings with details about host, location, reviews, and pricing.

columns.name: log_price
columns.description: Natural log of the nightly listing price.

columns.name: property_type
columns.description: Type of property (e.g., Apartment, House, Condominium).

columns.name: room_type
columns.description: Type of room offered (Entire home/apt, Private room, etc.).

columns.name: accommodates
columns.description: Number of guests the listing can accommodate.

columns.name: bathrooms
columns.description: Number of bathrooms available in the listing.

columns.name: bed_type
columns.description: Type of bed provided (e.g., Real Bed, Futon).

columns.name: cancellation_policy
columns.description: Type of cancellation policy (e.g., flexible, moderate, strict).

columns.name: cleaning_fee
columns.description: Indicates whether a cleaning fee is charged (True/False).

columns.name: city
columns.description: City where the property is located (e.g., NYC, SF, LA).

columns.name: first_review
columns.description: Date of the first review for the listing.

columns.name: host_has_profile_pic
columns.description: Indicates if the host has a profile picture (t/f).

columns.name: host_identity_verified
columns.description: Indicates if the host’s identity is verified (t/f).

columns.name: host_response_rate
columns.description: Percentage response rate of the host.

columns.name: host_since
columns.description: Date when the host registered on Airbnb.

columns.name: instant_bookable
columns.description: Indicates if the listing can be instantly booked (t/f).

columns.name: last_review
columns.description: Date of the most recent review.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Title or name of the listing.

columns.name: neighbourhood
columns.description: Neighbourhood or area where the listing is located.

columns.name: number_of_reviews
columns.description: Total number of reviews for the listing.

columns.name: review_scores_rating
columns.description: Average overall rating of the listing (0–100).

columns.name: zipcode
columns.description: Postal code of the listing location.

columns.name: bedrooms
columns.description: Number of bedrooms in the listing.

columns.name: beds
columns.description: Number of beds available in the listing.
